title.rendered: How to create your Own Product for eCommerce

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 39:29 — 36.1MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

Podcast (10k-podcast): Play in new window | Download (Duration: 39:29 — 36.1MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | TuneIn | RSS

Creating your own product is a key to E-commerce business success. But it can be a long and complex process. In this multi-part episode, Michael shares a 6-step process for creating your first unique product.

 

You’ll Learn: 

  • The 6 steps to creating a custom product
  • How to develop your own custom products
  • How to best go about developing a customer
  • How Market Research and Product Development are two sides of the same coin
  • To dive deep into your market research
  • To start with keyword research
  • How to identify pitfalls in your own industry
  • Brainstorming what you really know about and what you really care about
  • Reverse engineer the problem you are trying to solve
